about_the_game:
WARNING: This game contains distressing and disturbing graphic imagery, and depictions of violent crime. This game is not meant for children or the faint of heart!

ZEEP is a horror 2D action adventure rouge-lite where you, Gregory, and your friends explore a post-apocalyptic dungeon in order to retrieve a stolen vial of Murcurium.

  • Explore various areas as multiple different playable characters you can unlock.
  • Defeat a multitude of enemies and bosses.
  • Explore for items to improve your build.
  • Many weapon choices to suit your play style.
  • Consistent updates with new items, weapons, and challenges always being added.

content_descriptors.notes: General disturbing and unsettling content, depictions of death and murder, themes of self-harm and psychological distress, blood and graphic imagery, guns, swearing, suggestions of illegal drug use

short_description: ZEEP is a story-based action rouge-lite. Collect items to upgrade your abilities. Easy to pick up and play, you travel across multiple different dungeon areas, and fight your way through enemies with a multitude of weapons.
